column5: Whats your Opinions on the Okuma trio? I came across this spinning reel as I was looking at Shimano stradic reels. I've been told that the Okuma Trio is the top of the line and is a reel like no other. Im looking into this reel and want to know if it would be a good decision to buy it.
Buy whatever you like...you know your reels and this is my reason.
aha i know but what i meant by saying that is ill spend what ever amount to buy a good reel i just wanna know if this reel is actually good.
Save your allowance and buy the CI4 then... it's only $219 + tax !
Because if you want   Then you better triple your funds in the piggy bank
I'm willing to pay allot for a good reel i just want to know if this reel is any good
No, that one's no good. Go look up another one to ask us about.
Hey Shad, I stood up for you the other day but now you're pushin buttons. You need to chill.
I'd learn how to cast with braid and tie a knot before buying a reel that's 200 bucks.
okuma is fit for the pit.
Shouldn't you be on Lake Ontario trolling for salmon?

This thread went nowhere fast. He was new to the community and should perhaps you all should have been a little easier on him. Multiple "question" post are annoying but someone send him a PM with some protocol and shut this one down or just let it die. Who knows, he may have some valuable info. to provde.
I truly doubt it!!!!  I still want to know what a snacher is!!!
